name: MDF Magical Defense Force Chapters 10-18
description:
Magical Girl Michiki and cynical loner Frank Krieg continue their adventurers and battles against evil monsters, secret organizations, and the ever present specter of school, now under the watchful eye of Kourgan the ferret.

A new game continuing the same fun story, monster of the week battles, fully animated cutscenes, diverse soundtrack, and the same comedic attitude.
